headline: U.S. mRNA Therapeutics CDMO Market to Hit Valuation of US$ 6.27 Billion by 2033 | Astute Analytica
summary: Shifting from its pandemic response origins, the market is diversifying into new vaccines and oncology. Asset-light biotechs fuel this growth, making specialized CDMOs essential partners for advancing next-generation mRNA therapies into the clinic and beyond.Chicago, Aug. 14, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The US mRNA therapeutics CDMO market was valued at US$ 1.78 billion in 2024 and is expected to reach US$ 6.27 billion by 2033, growing at a CAGR of 15.01% during the forecast period 2025–2033.
